moves.1. d4 Nf6 2. f3 d5 3. Nc3 Nc6 4. e4 dxe4: Is this sensible?  It seemed like madness to me..
moves.7. Qe2 Qd4 8. Nf3 Qb4 9. O-O-O g6 10. Qd: Unfortunately I failed to appreciate how dangerous this was.
moves.10... Nxe4: I thought my knight was protected by my queen.
moves.11. Nxe4: When they went for what looked like another poor exchange, I thought I ought to reevaluate - and I quickly realised I was in trouble.  All downhill from here.
